mode.description: Refer to the convolve docstring.  Note that the default is ‘valid’, unlike convolve, which uses ‘full’.

old_behavior.description: old_behavior was removed in NumPy 1.10. If you need the old behavior, use multiarray.correlate.

out.description: Discrete cross-correlation of a and v.

note: with a and v sequences being zero-padded where necessary and conj being the conjugate. '
